title: Sports Betting Investigation
description: I investigated whether NFL teams tend to regress toward the mean against the spread after a standout performance (35+ points or beating the spread by 7+). Using 10 years of cleaned game and betting-line data, we flagged those “high-success” games and compared each team’s next-game spread outcome. Our initial findings reveal a noticeable underperformance trend, suggesting oddsmakers and bettors may overvalue recent hot streaks.

title: StuckIt.co
description: StuckIt is a skate-first platform where skaters upload videos linked to real-world stickers. Scan a sticker, upload your trick, and let your local scene see exactly where you landed it.

title: TuneUpMusic.vercel.com
description: TuneUp Music is a playlist blending app that instantly merges multiple Spotify or Apple Music playlists into one seamless, balanced mix — perfect for parties, workouts, and everyday listening.
